name: application(_:handleActionWithIdentifier:for:completionHandler:)
desc: Called when your app has been activated because user selected a custom action from the alert panel of a local notification.DeprecatedUse userNotificationCenter(_:didReceive:withCompletionHandler:) instead.
declaration:
optional func application(_ application: UIApplication, 
handleActionWithIdentifier identifier: String?, 
                      for notification: UILocalNotification, 
        completionHandler: @escaping () -> Void)
